items.title: ECAC
items.valueLabel: 2023~25 | ECA College - Graduate Diploma of Management
items.valueDescription: Currently undertaking this postgraduate course, skills associated with business growth, business management and leadership are being acquired through practical and experiential lessons.

items.title: ufgd
items.valueDescription: Degree obtained by concluding the Computer Engineering course at 'Universidade Federal da Grande Dourados (UFGD)'. As course conclusion critereas, I've done an intership at Dourasoft and published a paper on the design and  development of a system to collect data from the soil, which is based on networking multiple wireless sensor nodes, named Agriv, with another student.

items.title: ifsp
items.valueDescription: Degree obtained by concluding the Electonics Technician integrated with Secondary School course at 'Instituto Federal de Educação, Ciência e Tecnologia de São Paulo, Campus São Paulo (IFSP-SP)'. As course conclusion critereas, I've done an intership at Aureon, and with other students, we developed a digital door lock system for the final paper.

items.title: switch-connect
items.valueLabel: Sep ~ Dec 2023 | Business Analysis Intern | Switch Connect
items.valueDescription: On this role, I had exposure to CRM and Service delivery processes and the ICT MSP industry. I was introduced to concepts of process automation, my daily tasks consisted mainly of activities related to understanding internal processes, developing automations (mainly in HaloPSA and Power Automate), integrating different services through APIs, creating of end user guides and documentation of functionalities.

items.title: the-minded
items.valueLabel: Sep ~ Oct 2023 | App Development Consultant | The Minded
items.valueDescription: As an App Development Consultant, I advised the client in regards to requirement analysis for the development of the company's MVP. Also, it involved the understanding, mapping and diagramming of the proposed MVP's functionalities and processes, while suggesting improvements to increase chances of success, reduce risks and align the documentation provided to the desired end product.

items.title: mutant
items.valueLabel: May ~ Sep 2022 | Junior Programming Analyst | Mutant & Vivo
items.valueDescription: Employed by Mutant, I was allocated to work for Vivo. The job consisted of the development and maintenance of WhatsApp dialogs. Using Typescript and NodeJS, I performed tasks on the company developed wrapper that integrates the WhatsApp API and the company's AI, Aura.  Working in a multidisciplinary team with tasks managed using Agile Methodologies, I deepened my knowledge of Agile Methodologies, Typescript, use of JavaScript classes, NPM package development and creation of documentation.

items.title: rifaisso
items.valueDescription: I fully developed a REST API for RifaIsso. It was developed using Typescript with AdonisJS and Docker. During the development, I integrated the Mercado Pago API, made CRON routines, and learned AdonisJS and Docker implementation, which I was not familiar with.

items.title: teachlearn
items.valueDescription: I took part into the development of TeachLearn's first versions, made in Vue.js with Quasar and Node.js with Express.js. My tasks involved both, front end and back end development, but most of them were on the development of endpoints. One of my most notorious activities at this service, was the development and implementation of a chat system with socket.io.

items.title: dourasoft-free
items.valueDescription: After my Computer Engineering internship, I did some services as a Freelancer at DouraSoft. I developed and integrated a WhatsApp bot made with Java and selenium into the company's commercialised system. I also created a SQL script for the database migration from their desktop legacy system to their newer web app system.

items.title: dourasoft-intern
items.valueLabel: Feb ~ Jun 2019 - Web Development Intern | DouraSoft
items.valueDescription: To conclude my Computer Engineering course, I did my mandatory internship at DouraSoft, where I developed an OCR functionality to be integrated into company's developed and commercialised system. It was done with Amazon Textract (OCR). During the internship, Vue.js with Quasar, PHP with CakePHP, PostgreSQL, Google Cloud Services and Firebase skills were also learned.

Paragraphs: Hi, I'm Fernando. Graduated in Computer Engineering. I'm an aspiring Business Analyst and Software Developer. I am in the middle of a journey of taking on experiences that will help me build a solid pathway into a long lasting IT career.

As a result of all of my efforts up to this point, I have gathered invaluable work experiences and developed a vast range of skills, including strong problem solving skills, an analytical mindset, a solid foundation in corporate communication, business concepts and analytical techniques.

In this portfolio you can find extensive information about my previous work experiences in the "Experience" tab, the "Education" tab contains information related to online courses, certifications and formal degrees I have undertaken. As a consequence of self study, work experiences and educational background, the "Skills" tab has information about hard skills I have been developing throughout the years.

Although most of my previous work experiences have been in web development with NodeJs and VueJs, I have been constantly acquiring knowledge in different aspects of software development and business analysis. My goal is to perform as a Developer while improving myself and acquire more experiences until the point where I will be able to make use of all of my business acumen to work as an ICT Business Analyst or other managemental roles.

As a result of my professional development, I have acquired technical skills and gained knowledge in Software Development and Business Analysis. This section complements the results of my previous efforts described in the "Experience" and "Education" sections.

While I have come into contact with various technologies and tools, below is a list of those I am most proficient in. I have acquired expertise in these through coursework, work experiences, and self-study.

In addition to the technologies and tools mentioned, I have gained a comprehensive understanding of Business Analysis and Software Development concepts, encompassing SQL Queries, API development, data modeling, agile methodology, test-driven development, cloud services, process automation, requirement elicitation, UX, and API integrations.

As for business skills, I have honed essential skills that contribute to my effectiveness in various roles. These include problem-solving, corporate communication, adaptability, effective communication tailored to different audiences, the ability to work autonomously towards team goals, and self-motivation.

Items.author: Melody Tam
content: Working with Fernando was such a pleasure, he provided invaluable advice and insights for the development of our MVP, and I wholeheartedly recommend him for his exceptional expertise and dedication. Fernando is a true professional who brings a wealth of knowledge and experience to the table.

With remarkable ability to understand, enhance, and map out processes and functionalities crucial to the success of our project, his strategic thinking and attention to detail were evident in the planning phase of the project. Ensuring that our MVP was not only well-executed but also aligned with our long-term goals, he committed to himself to refining the initial documentation to precisely match our vision for the end product. His keen understanding of the industry, coupled with his effective communication skills, made the collaboration seamless and highly productive.
If you're looking for a professional who can elevate your project with strategic insights, meticulous planning, and a genuine commitment to success, Fernando is the ideal choice.

Items.author: Ben Seah Ph.D.
content: I had the pleasure of working closely with Fernando during our IT subjects, specifically in Model Data Objects and Build Advanced User Interfaces. From the very beginning, it was evident that Fernando was a highly motivated individual with a genuine passion for his work.

One of the standout qualities I noticed about Fernando was his ability to consistently deliver outstanding results. His completed projects were of the highest quality, showcasing his attention to detail and relentless effort. It was truly impressive to witness his commitment to excellence and his willingness to go the extra mile to ensure successful outcomes.

What impressed me even more was Fernando's decision to pursue a project management route as an extension of his education and work experience in IT. Together, we tackled various aspects of project management, including managing project risk, project procurement, personal and professional development, as well as project information and communication. Throughout these endeavours, Fernando proved himself to be consistent, dedicated, and highly capable.
